properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.R_TITLE, R.R_CONTENT, R.R_DATE, P.P_TITLE, A.FILE_PATH, A.CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN PLACE P ON R.PLAY_NO = P.P_NO JOIN ATTECHMENT A ON (A.C_NO = R.PLAY_NO) WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY R.R_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COM_NO, COM_CONTENT, SCORE, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, P_TITLE FROM PLAY_COMMENT JOIN PLACE ON P_NO=PLACE_NO
UNION ALL
SELECT COM_NO, COM_CONTENT, O.SCORE, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, ONE_TITLE FROM ONE_COMMENT O JOIN ONEDAYCLASS USING (ONE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY COM_NO
SELECT INQUIRE_NO,INQUIRE_TITLE,USER_NAME,CREATE_DATE,I.STATUS FROM INQUIRE I JOIN MEMBER ON USER_NO = INQUIRE_WRITER WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE, INQUIRE_NO
